introduction: This video discusses quantum computing job opportunities, focusing on software engineering roles related to quantum error correction and client delivery. Abby and Nick provide insights into the qualifications and requirements for these positions, as well as the growth and progression of the field.

sections.title: Section 1: Software Engineer - Quantum Error Correction
content: Job title mentioning quantum error correction
Typical software engineering job description with specific qualifications
Interesting to see how error correction is progressing in the field
Possibility of hiring someone without significant experience in CAD modeling

sections.title: Section 2: Quantum Client Delivery Lead
content: Flexibility in terms of experience and degree requirements
Interesting that no research experience is specified
